MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the DG9 postcode area of Stranraer. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.15pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing fault investigations into broken overhead line equipment in the area and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:50am on 16th January 2021.
